citation: Proclamation under the Evidence (Children and Special Witnesses) Amendment Act 2013 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Evidence (Children and Special Witnesses) Amendment Act 2013

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Evidence (Children and Special Witnesses) Amendment Act 2013 fix 1 March 2014 as the day on which all the provisions of that Act commence.

3 February 2014

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

BRIAN WIGHTMAN

Minister for Justice

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 12 February 2014

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
